Title: F*ck, Marry, Frieda
Writer: Jenji Kohan (created by), Jordan Harrison, Molly Smith Metzler (executive story editor), Rebecca Angelo (staff writer), Lauren Schuker Blum (staff writer), Josh Koenigsberg (staff writer), Anthony Natoli (staff writer)
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Natasha Lyonne, Uzo Aduba, Danielle Brooks
Plot: Maria convenes a special assembly in the chapel as the inmates plot their next move. Frieda makes use of the survival skills she learned as a kid.
